title: Rebrand extension manifest for Fastronome publisher
description: Update vss-extension.json publisher, extension id, display name, and repository links to the Fastronome fork while preserving task contribution identifiers for pipeline compatibility and keeping MIT license metadata intact.
close_reason: Updated vss-extension.json publisher, extension id/display name, and repository metadata for Fastronome while leaving task contribution identifiers unchanged

title: Rebrand README for Fastronome fork
description: Update README ownership/publisher messaging for the MIT-licensed Fastronome fork. Add clear attribution to original lineage, credit Alexey Samoylov, remove original donation links, and switch marketplace/repo/issue links to the Fastronome fork and new publisher/extension identity.
close_reason: Updated README for Fastronome publisher branding, MIT fork attribution, and Fastronome marketplace/repo/issue links; removed original donation links
